frontmatter.title: MouldCraft
frontmatter.abstract: Game Based on Blocks of Micro-organisms Grown with a Help of Internet-Controlled Robot

markdownRemark.html: MouldCraft is a game that allows you to design and modify alternative worlds dominated by micro-organisms. Using different blocks containing a variety of species, the players connect, stack, and destroy blocks to create an imaginary world. This process is partially automated through an internet-controlled Lego robot.
